description:
This course is for you if you're a fiction writer who would like to see your work self-published. When you have finished this course, you will have both a Kindle ebook and a printed book available for purchase on the Amazon store.

The course is structured on a simple step-by-step basis using screenshot videos. A supplementary ebook covering the same elements will be available to refer to offline.

I designed this course for novelists because the format of a novel is simple - a certain number of words divided by chapters. The insertion of images will be covered, but If you're writing children's books with images and wrap-around text, or non-fiction, then this course is not for you.
title: Publish Your Novel on Amazon Kindle and Print on Demand
